s:method.name: ListDeviceTypes
s:method.description: Lists the available vendor/model combinations for supported IPCD devices

s:return.name: deviceTypes
s:return.description: List of supported IPCD device types

s:method.name: FindDevice
s:method.description: Finds the IPCD device for the given vendor/model/sn combination that uniquely identies an IPCD device

s:parameter.name: deviceType
s:parameter.description: The type of device to search for

s:parameter.name: sn
s:parameter.description: The serial number of the device the user would register with

s:return.name: ipcdDevice
s:return.description: A structure containing the IPCD device information

s:return.name: device
s:return.description: The full device object if the IPCD device is registered

s:method.name: ForceUnregister
s:method.description: Forces unregistration of an IPCD device

s:parameter.name: protocolAddress
s:parameter.description: The protocol address of the device to forcibly remove

s:event.name: DeviceClaimed
s:event.description: Issued from the IPCD Service to the IPCD Briges(s)/SAD Server when a device has been claimed

s:parameter.name: protocolAddress
s:parameter.description: Protocol address of the device claimed

s:parameter.name: accountId
s:parameter.description: The account ID that claimed the device

s:parameter.name: placeId
s:parameter.description: The place ID that claimed the device

s:event.name: DeviceRegistered
s:event.description: Issued from the IPCD Service to the IPCD Bridge(s)/SAD Server when a device has been fully registered (i.e. has a driver)

s:parameter.name: protocolAddress
s:parameter.description: Protocol address of the device fully registered

s:parameter.name: accountId
s:parameter.description: The account ID that claimed the device

s:parameter.name: placeId
s:parameter.description: The place ID that claimed the device

s:parameter.name: driverAddress
s:parameter.description: The address of the driver created

s:event.name: DeviceUnregistered
s:event.description: Issued from the IPCD Service to the IPCD Bridge(s)/SAD Server when a device has been unregistered

s:parameter.name: protocolAddress
s:parameter.description: Protocol address of the device unregistered

s:event.name: DeviceConnected
s:event.description: Issued from the IPCD Bridge(s)/SAD Server when a device comes online. The source should be the specific IPCD bridge/SAD Server

s:parameter.name: protocolAddress
s:parameter.description: Protocol address of the device that came online

s:event.name: DeviceDisconnected
s:event.description: Issued from the IPCD Bridge(s)/SAD Server when a device goes offline. The source should be the specific IPCD bridge/SAD Server

s:parameter.name: protocolAddress
s:parameter.description: Protocol address of the device that went offline

s:event.name: DeviceHeartBeat
s:event.description: Issued from the IPCD Bridge(s)/SAD Server with the protocol addresses of all online devices

s:parameter.name: partitionId
s:parameter.description: The partition the devices are on

s:parameter.name: connectedDevices
s:parameter.description: Protocol addresss of the devices connected
